    • Method Detail

      • formatValue

        public void formatValue(java.lang.StringBuffer toAppendTo,
                        java.lang.Object valueObject)
        Format a value according the format string.

        NOTE: this method must be thread safe! In particular, if it uses a Format instance that is not thread safe, i.e. DateFormat, this method must be synchronized, either on the method, if the format is a final property, or on the format instance itself.

        (${t_9cdad4d8b8854e698044e5a5fcff611e})
        Specified by:
        formatValue in class CellFormatter(${t_8d774dae3af0494e8527f22b16ab93fa})
        Parameters:
        toAppendTo - The buffer to append to.(${t_aad856acbf724dc5ba204a270f9eebe8})
        valueObject - The value to format.(${t_c0528f2b398d476680707910a2ae0189})

      • simpleValue

        public void simpleValue(java.lang.StringBuffer toAppendTo,
                        java.lang.Object value)
        Format a value according to the type, in the most basic way.

        NOTE: this method must be thread safe! In particular, if it uses a Format instance that is not thread safe, i.e. DateFormat, this method must be synchronized, either on the method, if the format is a final property, or on the format instance itself.

        For a number, this is "#" for integer values, and "#.#" for floating-point values.

        (${t_fc8d93901d8b4673b9fb22356c8e2b4f})
        Specified by:
        simpleValue in class CellFormatter(${t_8d15b93fd14a4dc599c2e24e3d1fce99})
        Parameters:
        toAppendTo - The buffer to append to.(${t_c9e6ebb026164033b49f42ced8902045})
        value - The value to format.(${t_0cf77ba7e1894923a0f74956047d11fa})
